column4: Dialogue
It’s waking up! It’s waking up!
What a relief ! I’m glad you’re okay little squirrel.
(Did she just say squirrel ?)
What the….
A talking squirrel ?!
Oi! Get away from that thing Gretel !
It must be a witch’s familiar trying to kidnap us for some evil witch !
Whoa Whoa Whoa. Calm down buddy I’m not a witch familiar
And even if I am why would I kidnap such skinny children like you two ?
Then what are you?
(How should I say about this?!)
Hmmmmmmm
I’m an apprentice of the fairy godmother.
She felt sorry for you two and sent me to help you.
Really?!
Yes... from now on I will stay with you guys until you two get the happy life you deserve.
Thank you! We will be in your care from now on.
There is a loud noise knocking
Oi! You brat come out here !
Do your chores ! Why are you two so lazy! Get up already !
Sorry mom. We will go now
